name: THE LAST BANQUET IN HERCULANEUM
description:
THE LAST BANQUET IN HERCULANEUM is an Adventure-style game where you control Septimius, a slave in Ancient Rome. On August 24, AD 79, the volcano Vesuvius erupted, destroying the cities of Pompeii and Herculaneum. Experience the last day in Herculaneum fulfilling the tasks necessary for the banquet.

 Completely developed by archeologists specialized in Ancient Rome, THE LAST BANQUET IN HERCULANEUM also has explanatory videos that deepen the themes of the game, and Didactic Guide for teachers, which can be downloaded free of charge from the website of the Laboratory for Roman Provincial Archaeology (LARP-MAE/USP): www.larp.mae.usp.br

THE LAST BANQUET IN HERCULANEUM is available in english and portuguese languages.
